types.name: Root
types.description: Manages event reminders, including creation and notification scheduling.

actions.name: create

params.name: text
params.description: The content or description of the reminder.

params.name: atDate
params.description: The scheduled date for the reminder event, if it is to occur only once.

params.name: repeat
params.description: A flag indicating whether the reminder should repeat periodically.

actions.description: Creates a new reminder with specified text and optionally sets a date and repetition.

actions.name: sendNotifications

params.name: id
params.description: The identifier of the reminder for which notifications should be sent.

actions.description: Triggers the sending of notifications for the reminder identified by the given ID.

fields.name: find

params.name: id
params.description: The unique identifier of the reminder to be retrieved.

fields.description: Retrieves a specific reminder by its unique identifier.

fields.name: reminders
fields.description: A list of all scheduled reminders.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The current operational status of the reminder service.

types.name: Reminder

fields.name: text
fields.description: The content or description of the reminder.

fields.name: repeat
fields.description: Indicates whether the reminder should be repeated.

fields.name: atDate
fields.description: Specifies the date and time when the reminder is scheduled.

actions.name: delete
actions.description: Removes a specified reminder from the system.

types.description: Manages reminders for events with options for repetition and scheduling.
